Furthermore, the integrand tends to zero exponentially at $\tau \to \infty$ uniformly on any finite interval of $\chi$, and at $\chi\to\pm\infty$ uniformly on any finite interval of $\tau$. Again, this leads to convergence and commutativity of the iterated improper integrals over $\tau$ and over $\chi$.
